message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $850,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay up to $750,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $800,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle!

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $780,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
